ResourceHeader.ResourceName: TIMED GUVI O/N2 Summary GIF Images

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: A combined map of GUVI O/N2 and CODE TEC (total electron content) over three days. The CODE TEC data were obtained from ftp.unibe.ch/aiub/CODE/ and re-sampled at GUVI O/N2 location and time.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The GUVI data used here are provided through support from the NASA MOamp;DA program. The GUVI instrument was designed and built by The Aerospace Corporation and The Johns Hopkins University. The Principal Investigator is Dr. Andrew B. Christensen and the Chief Scientist and co-PI is Dr. Larry J. Paxton. See also Data Usage Policy at http://guvitimed.jhuapl.edu/home_guvi-datausage.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Christensen, Andrew B.; Paxton, Larry J.
PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory; Space Physics Data Facility

InformationURL.Name: L3 Thermospheric O/N2 and TEC (GIF) Data Products Availability

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Thermospheric O/N2 and TEC (GIF) Data Request
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of GIF-formatted image files for this product. To request data: select the year and day then click the link of the desired file name.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Thermospheric O/N2 and TEC Gallery
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows viewing of individual images or a slideshow of a sequence of images. To request data: select the year and day and then click display.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI Data Products Access
AccessURL.Description: This web page provides access to data products as well as to descriptions and availability information.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Thermospheric O/N2 and TEC (PS) Data Request
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of PostScript-formatted image files for this product. To request data: select the year and day then click the link of the desired file name.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI Data Products Access
AccessURL.Description: This web page provides access to data products as well as to descriptions and availability information.

DisplayData.ProviderResourceName: GUVI O/N2 and Total ELectron Content (TEC) Summary Images
DisplayData.Caveats: The L1C files currently available are being evaluated. Please contact GUVI team before using

Parameter.Name: O/N2 Data
Parameter.Description: The thermospheric column number density ratio of O and N2.
